sourcesContent:
import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' function Add_Disaster() { const [disastertype,Setdisastertype] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/disasterinfo").then((response)=>{ Setdisastertype(response) console.log(response) }) },[]) return ( <>

ADD DISASTER

Disaster Name Date Disaster Type Option
    {disastertype.map((val)=>( {val.disaster_type} ))}
) } export default Add_Disaster
